tafsirQuiz.question: Which concept is emphasized in Surah Ar-Rahman, Ayah 1?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: He granted them the unique power of speech—a power not bestowed upon any other creature or anything else in the whole known universe. Then, there is the practical example of the role of justice and fair play which inheres in the universe at God’s behest
distractors: This verse promises paradise to the righteous
This verse warns about the punishment of disbelievers
This verse narrates a historical event

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah Ar-Rahman, Ayah 10?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The exceptional treatment of man and the earth in this universe is such a great manifestation of God’s grace and bounty that man is in no way capable of thanking his Creator sufficiently
distractors: This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse describes the characteristics of believers

tafsirQuiz.question: What deeper meaning is explained in this verse?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The signs of God in this world are so many that it is not possible for any thinking individual to ignore them. the objects on which things depend for their continued existence are not self-created
distractors: This verse addresses only legal rulings
This verse focuses on scientific facts
This verse is primarily about historical events

tafsirQuiz.question: According to the tafsir, what should we understand from this verse?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: But, in spite of this complete freedom, no jinn or human being has the power to go beyond the limits of the universe. So long as the period of testing lasts, everybody has the opportunity to be as arrogant as he pleases
distractors: This verse is primarily about historical events
This verse addresses only legal rulings
This verse only discusses worldly matters

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah Ar-Rahman, Ayah 37?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The Truth which they were not ready to accept, in spite of the strong arguments in its favour in the present world, will be accepted by them on Doomsday without dispute
distractors: This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse explains the rules of inheritance
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The Paradise with two gardens mentioned in these verses is that of the first category. Such bounties will be available to those who were so overwhelmed by thoughts of God that in the present world itself they made themselves stand, as if in the august presence of God
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets

tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse warn or promise?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: This will also have two gardens like the first Paradise. In comparison with the bounties of the present world, the bounties of this Paradise will also be unimaginably greater
distractors: This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse explains the rules of inheritance
